languages.text: "Мерзость показала свой лик... самое время избавить Футфол от очередного комка скверны".
"The vileness shows its face at last... It is time we rid Footfall of yet another lump of filth."
languages.original_text: "Мерзость показала свой лик... самое время избавить Футфол от очередного комка скверны".

traits.locale_text: "The vileness shows its face at last... It is time we rid Footfall of yet another lump of filth."

languages.text: « L'infamie apparaît enfin au grand jour... L'heure est venue d'expurger à nouveau Castel de ces immondices. »
languages.original_text: "The vileness shows its face at last... It is time we rid Footfall of yet another lump of filth."

traits.locale_text: « L'infamie apparaît enfin au grand jour... L'heure est venue d'expurger à nouveau Castel de ces immondices. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ついに卑劣な顔が表に出てきたな…フットフォールから、また新たな穢れた塊を取り除く時が来たようだ」
languages.original_text: "The vileness shows its face at last... It is time we rid Footfall of yet another lump of filth."

traits.locale_text: 「ついに卑劣な顔が表に出てきたな…フットフォールから、また新たな穢れた塊を取り除く時が来たようだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “卑鄙之人终于露面了……是时候再为落脚港清理掉一批卑鄙的污秽了。”
languages.original_text: "The vileness shows its face at last... It is time we rid Footfall of yet another lump of filth."

traits.locale_text: “卑鄙之人终于露面了……是时候再为落脚港清理掉一批卑鄙的污秽了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Widerwärtigkeit zeigt endlich ihr Gesicht ... Es wird Zeit, Footfall von einem weiteren Klumpen Abfall zu befreien."
languages.original_text: "The vileness shows its face at last... It is time we rid Footfall of yet another lump of filth."

traits.locale_text: "Die Widerwärtigkeit zeigt endlich ihr Gesicht ... Es wird Zeit, Footfall von einem weiteren Klumpen Abfall zu befreien."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Esta inmundicia se muestra al fin... Hora de librar Paso de otro montón de basura».
languages.original_text: "The vileness shows its face at last... It is time we rid Footfall of yet another lump of filth."

traits.locale_text: «Esta inmundicia se muestra al fin... Hora de librar Paso de otro montón de basura».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Kötülük, sonunda yüzünü gösterdi... Binliman'ı bir pislikten daha arındırma vakti."
languages.original_text: "The vileness shows its face at last... It is time we rid Footfall of yet another lump of filth."

traits.locale_text: "Kötülük, sonunda yüzünü gösterdi... Binliman'ı bir pislikten daha arındırma vakti."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
